column4: Hey, i'm trying to get sun's java working on my system, i've downloaded 'j2eesdk-1_4_02_2005Q2-linux.bin' but am stuck there. I installed fakeroot, and java-package, java-common, and tried 'fakeroot make-jpkg j2eesdk-1_4_02_2005Q2-linux.bin' but i get a plugin not found error.
the .bin is designed to be run
if you have sun's java you prob won't be wanting gcj etc
personally I would go with sun until gcj is a bit better :) unless your list of java apps is limited
